type.name: Config
type.prop: Whether to surround property names with quotes. When the `dom` string is passed, it will only quote props for invoking html components, i.e., those that start with a lowercase letter (E.g., for the _Google Closure Compiler_).
The function to receive warnings, e.g., when destructuring of properties is used on dom elements (for Closure Compiler).
If a property name starts with a capital letter, the `className` of the _VNode_ will be updated.
